2010-11-18

You like the shoes I wear: Dean Wareham (again)


Dean Wareham Plays Galaxie 500 - 8
originally uploaded by Araakii

Long, long time since I gave this series a kick but Dean's shiny shoes with yellow laces as worn at the Crocodile Cafe in Seattle last weekend deserve getting shown off - particularly as this lovely picture by Araakii shows them off so beautifully.
